> **Legend** - [Click here to learn more](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/codecov-delta)
> `Δ = absolute <relative> (impact)`, `ø = not affected`, `? = missing data`
> Powered by [Codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/willmcgugan/rich/pull/407?src=pr&el=footer). Last update [908c55c...d6c25e1](https://codecov.io/gh/willmcgugan/rich/pull/407?src=pr&el=lastupdated). Read the [comment docs](https://docs.codecov.io/docs/pull-request-comments).

Sorry for the delay. I think this is a worthwhile addition and I appreciate the work you put in to this, but I think I'd like to tackle it in a different way. I was unaware that you can set level names in the logging library itself, and another solution may be required.

I'll have a change to master soon.
